price: Yang demikian itu, karena sesungguhnya mereka telah mengatakan kepada orang-orang (Yahudi) yang tidak senang kepada apa yang diturunkan Allah, "Kami akan mematuhi kamu dalam beberapa urusan," tetapi Allah mengetahui rahasia mereka.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُواْ مَا نَزَّلَ ٱللَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِي بَعۡضِ ٱلۡأَمۡرِۖ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzala al-lahu sanuṭīʿukum fī baʿḍi al-amri wal-lahu yaʿlamu is'rārahum
